short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to save the recipe listed on the current page to their KitKal account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the KitKal Extension will take out the manual process of adding recipes to your account!
Instead of copy-pasting everything into the app, you can use this chrome extension. It will pull the recipe details from the page you are on and auto-fill the recipe form for you in KitKal, so you don't have to go to the app to enter it in by hand!
Navigate to the URL of the recipe you are trying to add, then simply click on the KitKal extension. You'll see all the recipe details ready to go for you so all you need to do is save it - then your recipe will be instantly available.
